external_games.name: Doodle God Blitz: Hidden Object DLC

name: Doodle God Blitz: Hidden Object
summary: This DLC contains new Hidden Objects Mode with 3 episodes: Stone Age, Middle Ages and Modern Age. Try to find all the hidden objects in a real stone age cave, medieval dwelling and in a modern apartment! Players of all ages will enjoy a hidden object game mode with a unique Doodle God twist!
